name: Course Introduction, Syllabus, Agenda
description: Basic principles of full stack web development.

lessons.name: History of the Internet
lessons.description: A brief history of the Internet.

lessons.name: Internet Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of HTML and CSS.

lessons.name: Setting up the Development Environment
lessons.description: Overview of installing software for web development.

name: Formatting User Interfaces with HTML
description: How to create user interfaces with HTML and deploy the assignment with Netlify

lessons.name: HTML
lessons.description: Overview of HTML.

lessons.name: DOM
lessons.description: Overview of the DOM.

lessons.name: Styling
lessons.description: Formatting Web content with Headings.

name: Kambaz Web Application
description: Getting Started with the Kambaz Web Application.

lessons.name: Vercel Deployment
lessons.description: Overview of updating Vercel deployment.

lessons.name: Implementing Screens
lessons.description: Implementing the Kambaz Account Screens.

lessons.name: Improving Screens
lessons.description: Optimizing by implementing data-driven applications.

name: Linear Equations
description: Basic principles of solving linear equations.

lessons.name: Introduction to Linear Systems
lessons.description: A brief history and introduction of the linear systems.

lessons.name: Matrices, Vectors, and Gauss-Jordan Elimination
lessons.description: Basic methods on solving systems of linear equations.

lessons.name: On the Solution of Linear Systems
lessons.description: Theorems and facts on the relationships of linear equations.

name: Linear Transformations
description: Introduction to linear transformations and its applications to math problems.

lessons.name: Intro. to Linear Transformations and their Inverses
lessons.description: Definitions and theorems of a linear transformation and their inverses.

lessons.name: Linear Transformation in Geometry
lessons.description: Applications of linear transformations in a geometric sense.

lessons.name: Matrix Products
lessons.description: Understanding how to multiply matrices.

name: Subspaces of ℝⁿ and Their Dimensions
description: Exploring subspaces and multiple dimensions.

lessons.name: Image and Kernel of a Linear Transformation
lessons.description: Introduce the definitions and theorems of an image and kernel.

lessons.name: Subspaces of ℝⁿ; Bases and Linear Independence
lessons.description: Finding the basis (L.I and span a subspace) of a matrix.

lessons.name: The Dimension of a Subspace of ℝⁿ
lessons.description: Finding the dimensions of a matrix.

name: Object Oriented Design
description: Basic principles of object-oriented programming and design.

lessons.name: Essence of Objects: Why Object Oriented Design?
lessons.description: A brief history and introduction of the object oriented design.

lessons.name: Object-Oriented Design: A Simple Example
lessons.description: Demonstration of a simple object-oriented program.

lessons.name: Object-Oriented Design: Extending The Design
lessons.description: Demonstration of a complex object-oriented program.

name: Building the Model for Model, View, Controller (MVC)
description: Introduction to MVC design pattern.

lessons.name: Building the model for Model, View, Controller
lessons.description: Demonstration of a simple MVC-designed program.

lessons.name: Writing Controllers and Testing with Mocks
lessons.description: Testing a MVC-designed program with modularity.

lessons.name: Encapsulation and Invariants
lessons.description: Enforcing Proper Encapsulation, and Imposing Conditions on an Object.

name: Other Design Patterns
description: Design exercise.

lessons.name: Command Design Pattern
lessons.description: A better design for a program with many commands.

lessons.name: Inheritance and Composition
lessons.description: An alternative for code reuse.

lessons.name: The Adapter Design Patterns
lessons.description: How to add make my code compatible with other code.

name: Intro to Databases
description: Introduction to relational database management systems (RDBMS).

lessons.name: Getting Started
lessons.description: Download all necessary software and tools to access the coursework.

lessons.name: The Relational Model of Data and Relational Algebra (Part 1)
lessons.description: Learn relational algebra.

lessons.name: The Relational Model of Data and Relational Algebra (Part 2)
lessons.description: Learn relational algebra queries on the Chinook database.

name: SQL
description: Introduction to Structured Query Language (SQL).

lessons.name: SQL Part 1
lessons.description: Learn relational database key terms.

lessons.name: SQL Part 2
lessons.description: Learn basic MySQL datatypes with examples.

lessons.name: SQL Part 2
lessons.description: Learn how to create tables and relations in MySQL with examples.

name: Database Design
description: Learn how to create your own database with good design.

lessons.name: DB Design Part 1
lessons.description: How to draw ER diagrams and relational DB diagram.

lessons.name: DB Design Part 2
lessons.description: Example of DB Design with the HuskyWorks example database.

lessons.name: REST API
lessons.description: Designing and implementing a REST API and a RESTful matrix.

name: Games and Society
description: Explore the intersection between games, society, and culture.

lessons.name: Welcome! Introductions + syllabus
lessons.description: Group-based and class-based discussions and introductions.

lessons.name: How do games export culture?
lessons.description: Discuss reading; form teams for Games + Culture presentations.

lessons.name: What cultural values do games present, & how?
lessons.description: Groups work on their Games + Culture presentations.

name: Brief History of Contemporary Games
description: Discuss readings and play games.

lessons.name: Instruction Booklet Intro, Chs 1-2
lessons.description: Discuss the beginning of games based on the reading.

lessons.name: The Work of Art in the Age of Mechanical Reproduction
lessons.description: Discuss how industrialization changed the landscape for games.

lessons.name: The Medium is the Message pages 1-6
lessons.description: Discuss what `medium` is and its applications in the real world.

name: Introduction to Intersectional Feminism + Games
description: Discuss feminism in film and games.

lessons.name: Visual Pleasure and Narrative Cinema
lessons.description: Deep-dive into how feminism portrayed in old Hollywood films.

lessons.name: Gamergate culture war
lessons.description: Case study of misogyny in mainstream media and gamer culture.

lessons.name: Instruction Booklet Intro, Chs 3-4
lessons.description: Continue to work on feminism presentations and present; discuss textbook.

name: Probability and Statistics - Week 1
description: Introduction to basic probability topics.

lessons.name: Sample Spaces and the Algebra of Sets
lessons.description: Learn set algebra and sample spaces.

lessons.name: The Probability Function
lessons.description: Formulas and examples on the probability function.

lessons.name: Conditional Probability
lessons.description: Another way of expressing a probability function.

name: Probability and Statistics - Week 2
description: Introduction to slighly more complex probability topics.

lessons.name: Binomial Probabilities
lessons.description: Explore binomial probabilities and its examples.

lessons.name: Discrete Random Variables
lessons.description: Explore discrete random variables and its examples.

lessons.name: Continuous Random Variables
lessons.description: Explore continuous random variables and its examples.

name: Probability and Statistics - Week 3
description: Introduction to slightly more difficult probability topics.

lessons.name: The Variance
lessons.description: Explore variance and its examples.

lessons.name: Joint Densities
lessons.description: Explore join densities and its examples.

lessons.name: The Poisson Distribution
lessons.description: Introduction to distributions.

name: Assembly
description: Introduction to the OS and Assembly.

lessons.name: Intro to Computer Systems
lessons.description: Introduction to Operating Systems and CPUs.

lessons.name: Learning Assembly
lessons.description: Learn how to code in Assembly.

lessons.name: Memory, the Stack, Recursion
lessons.description: Learn how Assembly looks in a theoretical sense.

name: Intro to C
description: Introduction to coding in C and its relation to low-level concepts.

lessons.name: Learn to code in C
lessons.description: Explore the basics of coding in C with examples.

lessons.name: Processes
lessons.description: Learn what happens on a low-level when coding in C.

lessons.name: File I/O
lessons.description: Learn what happens on a low-level when coding in C

name: Extra Computer System topics
description: Learn special theoretical topics of computer systems.

lessons.name: Virtual Memory
lessons.description: Learn what is Virtual Memory.

lessons.name: Concurrency
lessons.description: Learn what is Concurrency.

lessons.name: OS Kernels, Booting, xv6
lessons.description: Learn what are OS Kernels; what is Booting.

name: Intro to Truth Tables, Number Theory, Set Theory, Quantifiers
description: Introduce formal mathematical notation.

lessons.name: Mathematical Statements and Truth Tables
lessons.description: Identify a mathematical statement and its truth value.

lessons.name: Number Theory and Set Theory
lessons.description: Identify groups of numbers as sets and explore its relations to other sets.

lessons.name: Universal and Existance Quantifiers
lessons.description: Learn formal notation on generalizations of sets of numbers.

name: Intro to Proof Methods
description: Introduction to coding in C and its relation to low-level concepts.

lessons.name: Direct Proof
lessons.description: Perform simple proofs.

lessons.name: Proof by Contradiction
lessons.description: Perform proofs by reductio.

lessons.name: Proof by ContraPositive
lessons.description: Perform proofs by the contrapositive of a mathematical statement.

name: More on Proof Methods
description: Learn special theoretical topics of computer systems.

lessons.name: Proof by Induction (weak)
lessons.description: Perform weak proof by induction.

lessons.name: Proof by Induction (strong)
lessons.description: Perform strong proof by induction.

lessons.name: Proof by Cases (Exhaustion)
lessons.description: Perform proof by cases.

name: Overview of Algorithms and Data
description: Provide an overview of the course.

lessons.name: Intro to Algo
lessons.description: Define an alorithm; what makes a good algorithm.

lessons.name: Time Complexity
lessons.description: Introduction to asymptotic notation; identify and calculate the runtimes of simple algorithms.

lessons.name: Linear Search
lessons.description: Demonstrate ability to write pesudocode of a simple algorithm in LatEx.

name: Intro to Sorting Algorithms
description: Proving correctness: loop invariant.

lessons.name: Insertion Sort (Part 1)
lessons.description: Demonstrate ability to write pesudocode of a simple algorithm in LatEx.

lessons.name: Insertion Sort (Part 2)
lessons.description: Identify a loop invariant and write a proof for a simple algorithm.

lessons.name: Insertion Sort (Part 3)
lessons.description: Practice algorithmic analysis through completion of practice problems.

name: Recursive algorithms
description: More on complex algorithms.

lessons.name: Divide & Conquer - Mergesort
lessons.description: Learn a recursive sorting algorithm.

lessons.name: Divide & Conquer - Quicksort
lessons.description: Learn a recursive sorting algorithm.

lessons.name: Data structure: Heap; Heapsort
lessons.description: Learn a recursive sorting algorithm.

name: Week 1
description: Provide foundational skills for CS students.

lessons.name: Propositional Logic
lessons.description: Understand propositional logic.

lessons.name: Compound Logic Statments
lessons.description: Understand compound logic statement.

lessons.name: Truth Tables
lessons.description: Understand truth tables.

name: Week 2
description: Provide foundational skills for low-level logic.

lessons.name: Introduction to Proofs
lessons.description: Understand proofs.

lessons.name: Predicate Logic
lessons.description: Understand predicate logic.

lessons.name: Binary Numbers & Two's Complement
lessons.description: Understand arithmetic with numbers of different bases.

name: Week 3
description: Provide more foundational skills for low-level logic.

lessons.name: Logic Gates and Arithmetic
lessons.description: Understand logic gates and arithmetic.

lessons.name: Set Operations and Logic
lessons.description: Understand set operations and logic.

lessons.name: Cardinality of Sets
lessons.description: Understand cardinality of sets.
